dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2288 RH: To remove the use restrictions on certain land transferred to Rockingham County, Virginia, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Goodlatte introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on May 13, 2015

form.official-title: To remove the use restrictions on certain land transferred to Rockingham County, Virginia, and for other purposes.

paragraph.text: by adding the following new section at the end:

subsection.text: The approximately 1-acre portion of the land referred to in section 3 that is used for purposes of a child care center, as authorized by this Act, shall not be subject to the use restriction imposed in the deed referred to in section 3.
Upon enactment of this section, the Secretary of the Interior shall execute an instrument to carry out subsection (a).

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
